ComicInfo.Summary:
THE BATTLE OF MADRIPOOR!
The Marauders are caught between the forces of Madripoor and the Black King's machinations! Thankfully, they have TWO Omega Level mutants onboard...
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|--------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Russell Dauterman & Matthew Wilson | 1 | | Var | Dark Phoenix Saga 40th Anniversary Variant Cover | Alan Davis & Chris Sotomayor | 2 |
